Anton van der Westhuizen out to arm-wrestle his world title backhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/anton-out-to-arm-wrestle-his-world-title-back/NPM6XYT7SFHALLAB77666EQSSY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/anton-out-to-arm-wrestle-his-world-title-back/NPM6XYT7SFHALLAB77666EQSSY/ Ayla YeomanHe can’t wait to “show the world what Kiwis can do”. Teenage pedestrian hospitalised after reportedly being struck by vehicle during Canterbury car meet https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teenage-pedestrian-hospitalized-after-reportedly-being-struck-by-vehicle-during-canterbury-car-meet/56R3EWV5BVBN3OWLFPWT76A7EE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teenage-pedestrian-hospitalized-after-reportedly-being-struck-by-vehicle-during-canterbury-car-meet/56R3EWV5BVBN3OWLFPWT76A7EE/ A teenager was reportedly struck by a ute before it fled the scene.
